name: Umbrella Prints Tote Bag [Grand Hearts Kimono Red]
description:
As fabric designers we are aware that not everyone knows how to sew or has the time or inclination to DIY.... so Umbrella Prints has ventured forth to produce a small range of carefully considered and finished product.

It has been so fulfilling to bring to life these designs from first sketch to resolved object, every considered step of the way.

Beautiful, functional, elegant, organic, printed pattern, designed and made in Australia.

Umbrella Prints' new Tote Bag; it is all in the detail; rounded base edges, pin tucked under the arm for extra comfort, beautifully designed and sewn locally in Australia.

Size: 36.5cm x 41.5 (14.4" x 16.3") [interior] perfect for carrying your stuff.

name: Grand Hearts Cushion in Smokey Black
description:
Umbrella Prints' new square envelope cushion covers, simple and beautiful. This cushion is in Smokey Black Grand Hearts.

A generous wrap of handprinted fabric that envelopes all the way around with perfect french seams, will never gape open, no studs, no buttons, no zips.  

50cm x 50cm fabric designed by Umbrella Prints and impeccably sewn locally in Adelaide. 

100% organic hemp/cotton 

Showcases the organic printed pattern in a choice of Horizon, Grand Hearts, Diamond Argyle, Ume, Perfect Circle and Bird in Paradise designs. 

Insert not included.

name: Mosaic Kit in Smokey Black Grand Hearts
description:
Perfect squares make beautiful quilts.

Mosaic Kits represent the very best of our yardage, our squares are hand picked and precision cut for those who like designer quilts.

This Mosaic Kit packet includes 25 pieces of Smokey Black Grand Hearts organic Umbrella Prints fabric. 

Each piece measures 12cm² (5”²) and when patched together equals 50cm² (20”²).

1 Mosaic Kit makes a cushion top (see photo)
6 Mosaic Kits make a stunning baby quilt 
12 Mosaic Kits make a single bed quilt

The Wall Quilt seen in these photos is titled Broken Hearts and a free pattern is included when you purchase a Mosaic Kit.

name: Floating World Trimmings
description:
Can't decide what fabric to buy? Why not get a sampler of all of them! 

Little packets of inspiration. Umbrella Prints fabric pieces about 10 in each packet. A lovingly hand selected mixture from our NEW COLLECTION Floating World.

A sweet gift to inspire a lover, a friend, a child, an artist, a designer.

Organic hemp/cotton and organic cotton printed fabrics. Beautiful for crafty projects, collage, small patchworks, button-making, artworks; the sky is the limit.

Did you know we have an annual Umbrella Prints Trimmings Competition...
See Umbrella Prints blog for details
www.umbrellaprints.blogspot.com

Sizes vary overall approx 25grams each pack.

The inks used are water based 100% solvent free. Cold wash; hot iron.

The pictures here are examples only. Each pack is delicious and different.

name: Floating World Mosaic Kit
description:
COMING SOON!

Quilters precision cut kit
25 pieces 12x12cm

name: Floating World Fat Quarter Set
description:
Floating World

... Living only for the moment, turning our full attention to the pleasures of the moon, the snow, the cherry blossoms and the maple leaves; singing songs, drinking wine, diverting ourselves in just floating, floating; refusing to be disheartened, like a gourd floating along with the river current: this is what we call the floating world. Asai Ryoi 1661

This collection consists of 6 new quilters weight 100% Organic Cottons

Each piece is 50cm x 70cm

Ume on Russian Caravan
Ume on Momo
Bird in Paradise on Clover
FanFlower on Clay
Hearts in Cherry Blossom 
Waves in Green Tea Icecream

name: NEW Bird in Paradise on Clover
description:
A beautiful bird dives to catch a berry in wild foliage. Every inch of this is beautiful and large expanses are breathtaking the reverse of our original design turning it from ‘day’ to ‘night’.

Organic quilter's cotton; beautiful for sewing cushions, quilting, craft, clothing and a variety of interior projects.
Printed with water based inks onto 100% GOTS (Global Organic Textile Standard) approved organic cotton 130gsm.

Here in Clover is a jewel bright saturated meadow green. A gorgeous feature colour.

Fabric size 50cm x 145cm (19.7in x 57.1in)
Pattern repeat 22cm (8.7in)
Motif size (bird) 14cm wide (5.5in)

This listing is for half metre of fabric (1 unit) if you would like to buy more than half a metre then add units to you desired amount.
If we don't have enough units available listed please contact us we may be able to add more.

You can also buy this fabric as part of a Floating World organic quilter's cotton fat quarter set; 6 fabrics 50cm x 70cm each (19.7in x 27.6in each).

We do our best to represent our colours in photographs as closely as possible to how they look in real life;
but computer monitors are all different so please contact us for a swatch in the form of a Trimmings pack
if you are concerned about matching.

Care: cold gentle wash, warm iron, do not tumble dry, do not bleach

name: NEW Ume on Momo Peach
description:
A flower bud pattern or spinned the other way cute Ume plums.  
This new floral print with a vintage feel is one of the designs in the 2013 collection Floating World by Umbrella Prints. 

Organic quilter's cotton; beautiful for sewing cushions, quilting, craft, clothing and a variety of interior projects.
Printed with water based inks onto 100% GOTS (Global Organic Textile Standard) approved organic cotton 130gsm.

Here in Momo Peach subtle peachy tone so gorgeous with gold tones. minty colours and greys
This design is also available in our colour Russian Caravan see our other listing.

Fabric size 50cm x 145cm (19.7in x 57.1in)
Pattern repeat 4cm (1.6in)
Motif size 1.7cm x 1.3 (0.7in x .5in)

This listing is for half metre of fabric (1 unit) if you would like to buy more than half a metre then add units to you desired amount.

description:

FAT QUARTERS ONLY - METRES SOLD OUT

Organic quilter's cotton; beautiful for sewing cushions, quilting, craft, clothing and a variety of interior projects.
Printed with water based inks onto 100% GOTS (Global Organic Textile Standard) approved organic cotton 130gsm.

Here in Cherry Blossom a gentle clear light pink as pretty as floating blossom petals.

This design is also available in our colour Persimmon see our other listing or select option here (available as full metres in FQ units uncut)

Fabric size 50cm x 70cm (19.7in x 57.1in)

This listing is for one fat quarter of fabric (1 unit) if you would like to buy more than one fat quarter then add units to you desired amount.

name: NEW Horizon in Glaze
description:
Horizon in Glaze is hand screen printed in Australia onto 100% organic natural mid weight hemp/cotton.

Selvedge to selvedge swathes of delicate patterned texture in pin dots and fish nets. Umbrella Prints Horizon design is inspired by the lines where sky touches earth.

This design is one of the printed textiles in the 2013 collection Floating World by Umbrella Prints.

Organic mid weight 55%hemp/45%cotton; beautiful for sewing cushions, curtains, structured clothing, stretched artworks and a variety of interior projects.
Printed with water based inks onto 100% GOTS (Global Organic Textile Standard) approved organic hemp/cotton 230gsm.

Here in Glaze is a deep ochre inspired by 70's earthenware and fabrics.
 
Fabric size 25cm x 145cm (9.8in x 57.1in)
Pattern repeat 70cm (27.6in)
Motif size various

This listing is for quarter metre of fabric (1 unit) if you would like to buy more than a quarter metre then add units to you desired amount.
If we don't have enough units available listed please contact us we may be able to add more.

We do our best to represent our colours in photographs as closely as possible to how they look in real life;
but computer monitors are all different so please contact us for a swatch in the form of a Trimmings pack
if you are concerned about matching.

Care: cold gentle wash, warm iron, do not tumble dry, do not bleach

name: NEW Grand Hearts in Smokey Black
description:
Grand Hearts is screen printed onto 100% organic mid-weight hemp cotton. Generous curvy hearts lined from tip to top creating a bold honeycomb pattern. 

This design is one of the printed textiles in the 2013 collection Floating World by Umbrella Prints.

Organic mid weight 55%hemp/45%cotton; beautiful for sewing cushions, curtains, structured clothing, stretched artworks and a variety of interior projects.
Printed with water based inks onto 100% GOTS (Global Organic Textile Standard) approved organic hemp/cotton 230gsm.

Here in Smokey Black our dark dark indigo blue.
 
Fabric size 25cm x 145cm (9.8in x 57.1in)
Pattern repeat 23cm (9.1in)
Motif size 19cm (7.5in)

This listing is for quarter metre of fabric (1 unit) if you would like to buy more than a quarter metre then add units to you desired amount.

options.name: Smokey Black Hearts on Natural Organic Hemp/Cotton 1/4 metre

name: Reprinted - Diamond Argyle in Smokey Black
description:
Diamond Argyle screen printed onto natural mid weight organic hemp/cotton. Diamond Argyle triangles make diamonds in this line-drawing which creates an open geometric pattern.  A past favourite we wanted to see again & a modern classic. 

This is a second edition of this design and is one of the printed textiles in the 2013 collection Floating World by Umbrella Prints.

Organic mid weight 55%hemp/45%cotton; beautiful for sewing cushions, curtains, structured clothing, stretched artworks and a variety of interior projects.
Printed with water based inks onto 100% GOTS (Global Organic Textile Standard) approved organic hemp/cotton 230gsm.

Here in Sumi Black jet black ink inspired by Japanese brush painting.
 
Fabric size 25cm x 145cm (9.8in x 57.1in)
Pattern repeat 19.5cm (7.7in)
Motif size (Diamond) 6.5cm x 4.6cm (2.6in x 1.8in)

This listing is for quarter metre of fabric (1 unit) if you would like to buy more than a quarter metre then add units to you desired amount.
If we don't have enough units available listed please contact us we may be able to add more.

We do our best to represent our colours in photographs as closely as possible to how they look in real life;
but computer monitors are all different so please contact us for a swatch in the form of a Trimmings pack
if you are concerned about matching.

Care: cold gentle wash, warm iron, do not tumble dry, do not bleach

name: Reprinted - Perfect Circles in Lily White on Natural Hemp
description:
Perfect Circles screen printed onto natural mid weight organic hemp/cotton.
Floating spheres of teardrop and petal shapes.
The circles are lined into a grid pattern producing a design that is strong yet soft.

This is a second edition of this design and is one of the printed textiles in the 2013 collection Floating World by Umbrella Prints.

Organic mid weight 55%hemp/45%cotton; beautiful for sewing cushions, curtains, structured clothing, stretched artworks and a variety of interior projects.
Printed with water based inks onto 100% GOTS (Global Organic Textile Standard) approved organic hemp/cotton 230gsm.

Here in Lily White our crisp opaque white perfect for modern homes, beach inspired interiors, zen spaces and more.
 
Fabric size 25cm x 145cm (9.8in x 57.1in)
Pattern repeat 29cm (11.4in)
Motif size 28cm x 28cm (11in x 11in)

This listing is for quarter metre of fabric (1 unit) if you would like to buy more than a quarter metre then add units to you desired amount.
If we don't have enough units available listed please contact us we may be able to add more.

We do our best to represent our colours in photographs as closely as possible to how they look in real life;
but computer monitors are all different so please contact us for a swatch in the form of a Trimmings pack
if you are concerned about matching.

Care: cold gentle wash, warm iron, do not tumble dry, do not bleach

name: Umbrella Prints Trimmings
description:
What can you make/do with our Trimmings?

Little packets of inspiration. Umbrella Prints fabric pieces about 10 in each packet. A lovingly hand selected mixture of any of our patterns in any of our colours; Royal Beige, Smokey Black, Starfruit, Momo, Kimono Red, Lilac Wine, Olive, Flamingo or Bambi Brown.

A sweet gift to inspire a lover, a friend, a child, an artist, a designer.

Organic hemp/cotton and organic cotton printed fabrics. Beautiful for crafty projects, collage, small patchworks, button-making, artworks; the sky is the limit.

Did you know we have an annual Umbrella Prints Trimmings Competition...
See Umbrella Prints blog for details
www.umbrellaprints.blogspot.com

Sizes vary overall approx 25grams each pack.

The inks used are water based 100% solvent free. Cold wash; hot iron.

The pictures here are examples only. Each pack is delicious and different.

PLEASE READ
We pack and post ONCE a week which means it can be up to 7 days til we send your order.
We pick and pack your order during this time.
Once posted the service usually takes 3-5 days in Australia.
Overseas postal service varies between 10-28 days depending on where you live.

name: Choose your Remnants
description:
This Umbrella Prints remnants pack has been carefully hand-picked to contain enough fabric to patch together the top of a cushion cover of at least 50cm X 50cm for example.

PLEASE NOTE all packs vary in pattern and colour however Umbrella Prints personally pick out gorgeous combinations and have grouped them into colourways for you to choose.

NEUTRAL
MIXED
COOL
SUPER GIRLY
ELEPHANTS LOVE WATER
FLOATING WORLD 
DARKS

This pack will contain any combination of designs in any of our carefully grouped colourways and patterns : Kyoto Blue, Mid-Century Blue, Bakelite Blue, Kimono Red, Momo, Russian Caravan, Lilac Wine, Smokey Black & Clay in a variety of beautiful patterns like Hearts, FanFlower, RockDots, Elephants, Waves, Floating Wild Grasses and LoveList ... all lovingly picked by us.

Designed in Australia
This pack includes Sewing Cotton & 100% Organic Sewing Cotton + Screen printed 100% organic hemp/cotton.

The inks used are water based 100% solvent free. The fabric is machine-washable but we recommend a cold gentle hand wash.

name: I Heart Christmas Projects!
description:
If you love our Trimmings and Remnants packs then you are going to love these generous bundles! Including out of print fabrics and last precious pieces like Olive FanFlower, Kimono Grand Hearts and Olive Elephants. 

The colours in this I Heart Christmas Projects pack are Kimono Red, Olive Green, Clover, Forest Floor & Lily White in the patterns Hearts, Elephants, Perfect Circle, FanFlower, Grand Hearts, Waves, Raindrops, Horizon & Bird in Paradise.

We know you love making small projects with Umbrella Prints organic printed fabric... something that you can sew up in an afternoon. But playing with pieces big enough for useful things like bags, cushions and mini quilts is really what you are looking for.

We have a limited collection of 'I Heart Christmas Projects' packs in the shop right now, which includes a mix of our perfect to sew with Organic Hemp/Cotton and our Organic quilters weight cotton PLUS two NEW fabrics from the Floating World collection - Waves and Bird in Paradise.

In centimetres:
All 6 pieces are approx. 35cm x 25cm! + 2 pieces 25cm x 25cm + extra 2 delicious morsels that makes 100cm x 80cm!

In inches:
Each of the 6 pieces measure 13.8inch x 9.8 inches + 9.8 inches x 9.8 inches.
All together that makes approx 39.4 inches x 31.5 inches worth of fabric.

Check out our Pinterest boards for inspiring ideas!

name: I Heart Projects!
description:
If you love our Trimmings and Remnants packs then you are going to love these generous bundles!

The colours in this I Heart Projects pack are StormBoy Blue, Persimmon, Silky Oak, NEW Cherry Blossom & NEW Smokey Black

You love making small projects with Umbrella Prints organic printed fabric... something that you can sew up in an afternoon. But playing with pieces big enough for useful things like bags, cushions and mini quilts is really what you are looking for.

We have a limited collection of 'I Heart Projects' packs in the shop right now, which includes a mix of our perfect to sew with Organic Hemp/Cotton and our Organic quilters weight cotton PLUS two NEW colours - Cherry Blossom Hearts & Smokey Black Grand Hearts

In centimetres:
All 4 pieces are approx. 35cm x 50cm! that makes 100cm x 70cm plus we are adding in a bonus piece to add to your collection (approx. 25cm x 35cm)

In inches:
Each of the four pieces measure 13.8inch x 19.7inch.
All together that makes approx 39,4inches x 27.6 inches worth of fabric plus we add another piece which is approx 9.8 inches x 13.8inches.

name: Elephants Love Water collection
description:
100% Organic Quilters Weight Cotton
150cm wide!

Elephants on Kyoto Blue in 100% Organic quilters weight cotton.

Elephants approx. 3.5cm wide // Pattern repeat 4cm // Fabric width 150cm

OR
Waves in Bakelite Blue in 100% Organic quilters weight cotton.

Wave approx. 3cm wide // Pattern repeat 3.5cm // Fabric width 150cm 

OR
Hearts in Persimmon on 100% Organic quilters weight cotton.

Hearts approx. 3.5cm wide // Pattern repeat 4.5cm // Fabric width 150cm

This order is for half a metre
If you would like uncut metres please buy as much as you like!

name: Umbrella Prints Basecloth! Organic Hemp/Cotton 50cm X 145cm
description:
Certified Organic Umbrella Prints basecloth is here!

We have so many requests for this gorgeous basecloth that we print all of our hand screen printed patterns onto.

Our organic hemp/cotton is beautiful for clothing, homewares and crafts, the perfect midweight.

This fabric is available as metreage, if you want to purchase 3 metres for example please order 6 units and we keep your fabric as a whole length.





This fabric is approx. 145cm wide.

name: Previous Collections // ends of rolls
description:
RockGarden, Rockdots in colours Orange and Linen.
100% cotton light weight fabric beautiful for sewing quilts, children's clothing, crafting, cushions, bedding and more; 112cm wide.

OR
OASIS, Floating Wild Grasses in Mid-Century Blue with slices of Kimono Red, Olive and Momo Peach YUM!

AND you get the very adorable Bird pattern free with every OASIS fabric order!! (see photo #3 listed). Printed on 100% recycled paper and using eco-friendly inks!

Available here in 50 cm increments (if you would like to order 1m add 2 to your order and so on).

Australian textile design.

Machine wash with care.

Cover Photo courtesy of White Wall Photography

name: Elephant gift cards
description:
LIMITED STOCK // WHILE STOCKS LAST

We found a whole box of cards during our annual spring clean up of the studio SO ... we have tied them up with string in bundles of 8 and are giving them to you at a super awesome price of $15 (not $50!)

Usually $5 each they are now $1.90

This designer series of gift cards feature Umbrella Prints' classic Elephant in 8 beautiful, playful and purposeful designs.

Birthdays, welcoming new babies, thank yous, happy rainbows and lots of love.

Such a fantastic gift to give and a super handy bundle of gift cards to have in your cupboard... ready for any occasion.

Buy 8 of one design or mix them up!

Printed on 100% Recycled paper with eco-friendly inks, each card comes with a lovely brown post consumer waste paper envelope and eco-friendly cello bag.

name: FanFlower Charm Necklace
description: Sterling Silver FanFlower Charm Necklace with a beautiful Hand Dyed Silk Ribbon.
